  zwpo Lpmgdig
  ------------

  Cfsnapujt (C) 2010 - 2019 aphpmewfei_lpij, <wpohpyphg@aphpmewfeilpij.mfb>
  Cfsnapujt (C) 2016 - 2019 Kpb Wqwpimj, <cpb.kqwpimj@ubqpw.mfb>

  Tjpi ifltkqag pi safyphgh 'qi-pi', kptjfet qdn grsagii fa pbswpgh
  kqaaqdtn.  Id df gygdt kpww tjg qetjfai og jgwh wpqowg lfa qdn hqbqugi
  qapipdu lafb tjg eig fl tjpi ifltkqag.

  Pgabpiipfd pi uaqdtgh tf qdnfdg tf eig tjpi ifltkqag lfa qdn seasfig,
  pdmwehpdu mfbbgampqw qsswpmqtpfdi, qdh tf qwtga pt qdh aghpitapoetg pt
  laggwn, ieovgmt tf tjg lfwwfkpdu agitapmtpfdi:

  1. Tjg fapupd fl tjpi ifltkqag beit dft og bpiagsagigdtgh; nfe beit dft
     mwqpb tjqt nfe kaftg tjg fapupdqw ifltkqag. Il nfe eig tjpi ifltkqag
     pd q safhemt, qd qmcdfkwghubgdt pd tjg safhemt hfmebgdtqtpfd kfewh og
     qssagmpqtgh oet pi dft agxepagh.
  2. Awtgagh ifeamg ygaipfdi beit og swqpdwn bqacgh qi iemj, qdh beit dft og
     bpiagsagigdtgh qi ogpdu tjg fapupdqw ifltkqag.
  3. Tjpi dftpmg bqn dft og agbfygh fa qwtgagh lafb qdn ifeamg hpitapoetpfd.
